title: Special edition Paria Farzaneh Powerbeats Pro now available
content:
Apple has collaborated with English-Iranian fashion designer Paria Farzaneh on a special edition pair of Powerbeats Pro – the yellow and purple design showcases the London-based designer’s unique style. These earbuds are exclusively on sale through Canadian-based retailer, SSENSE.

more…

The post Special edition Paria Farzaneh Powerbeats Pro now available appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple has collaborated with English-Iranian fashion designer Paria Farzaneh on a special edition pair of Powerbeats Pro.
